summary.title: Professional Summary
summary.value: Front-end developer with extensive experience in high-performance app development, particularly in PWA and React/Next.js. Proven skills in complex project management and team leadership, with success in delivering scalable solutions and optimizing app performance. Consistently achieved notable goals, including a 100% Lighthouse score for mobile performance and guiding projects with advanced business features.

items.title: Role
items.value: Front-End Developer

items.value: 1 month

items.title: Technologies
items.value: JavaScript, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, React.js, Next.js, React-hook-form, Axios, React Query, Zustand, Docker

items.title: Description
items.value: A banking super app focused on inquiries for credit and transactions.

items.title: Key Achievements
items.value: Achieved 100% Lighthouse score on mobile; streamlined cloud deployment with automated Docker build.
